12.title: Pokimane  (gamer)

choices: Lucky day! I don't have symptoms yet. But I just wanna taste you.
Unlucky day..... I just had the dizziness thing... so I'm gonna have to eat you.
121.content:
A little backstory on your situation:

A few years ago a virus named RCD (Dubbed, "the shrinking virus") began ravaging the world, scientists began working desperately for a cure. The virus had infected every human on the planet. However, the gestation period seemed completely random per person. You never knew when it would start taking effect on you. However, equally as puzzling, a symptom of extreme dizziness predicted a person to be within 3 days of shrinking with 100% accuracy. Unfortunately, one the shrinking takes effect, there is no way to unshrink. You are stuck at 1 inch tall for the rest of your life.

Finally, scientists did find one solution that would stop the virus in its tracks. If an infected person who hasn't shrunk yet eats another infected person who has shrunk, they will be completely cured of the virus. The world searched desperately for a way to synthetically replicate the effect. However, the task proved impossible. Thus, it was unanimously decided by all the governments of the world that half of the population would have to be sacrificed to save the other. Because all shrunken people must be eaten by unshrunken people to cure them. In an effort to soften this cruel reality somewhat, two provisions were given to tinies.

1. They were allowed to choose their owner should they shrink. (These are contained in will-like documents most people in the wolrd are sure to have. Anyone who does not have one will end up being auctioned off to the nearest buyer. These auctions usually pull in extremely high revenue for the government, as they are usually attended by those who have recently developed rcd symptoms and have not yet acquired a tiny to cure them. Unfortunately for tinies in this situation, they are almost always eaten immediately. A case which is not often true for tinies who choose their owners, because of provision 2.)
2. Owners are not to eat their tinies until they have shown symptoms. (Because of this rule, tinies can often live with their owners, potentially their whole lives, depending on their luck. The owner may never develop symptoms, or they may develop them the next day.


As for you: After discovering the beyond-comparison adorable goddess that was Pokimane on the internet, you went through the online process to change your prospective owner from your ex-girlfriend, to Poki.

Admittedly, it was quite a tough decision. Brianna was by far the hottest girl you'd ever been with. She was somehow simultaneously a bit of a tomboy, and unbelievably sexy. And, having a bit of a thing for shrinking, feet, and vore long before RCD came to be... you had often fantasized about how incredible it might be to live every second of your life inside Brianna's boots or in her hot mouth. But at the end of the day, she still couldn't compare to Poki. Thus, you made your decision.

And thus, you find yourself in your current situation. 1 inch tall. Stuck in Pokimane's rice bowl. She looks down at you, prodding you with gigantic chopsticks, and says: "Hey little guy!! Thanks so much for choosing me!" She smiled, her doe brown eyes shown like moons and she nibbled hey massive lower lip, showing enormous glowing white teeth. "It's your ..."
121.title: In her food

1211.content:
You weren't sure whether to be excited or terrified. But before you could think, the two giant smooth logs of her chopsticks secured you in place, and lifted you up into the air. From this position, you could see her gaming setup. She was playing league on one monitor and monitoring her live stream on the second. Apparently you were going to be part of the show.. You looked down and hundreds of feet below you could just see her cute perfectly pedicured bare toes, currently sinking into the carped, moving slightly. They were painted blue at the moment, matching her nails. When you looked back up, you noticed you were right in front of her unfathomably enormous lips. Without a word... they parted. And you were hit with a heavy, hot mist of breath. It smelled of cherries with a slight must creeping in. Her deep red tongue extended out and lapped you up into her mouth. In an instant your whole world was turned upside down as her lips closed behind you and her massive muscle tossed you from side to side in her mouth. The soft floor was still for just a moment and you settled to the center of her mouth, before the squishy floor shot up and pressed you against the hard ridged ceiling of her mouth. It felt like every single one of your limps was being pulled in a different direction as she sucked on your tiny form, like a fresh mint. After a few minutes of this torture, the sucking finally subsided, and her lips parted. Too tired to move, you could only look out of her mouth at the large camera lens pointing at you. And just below it, your pitiful image inside Poki's beautiful mouth on the monitor. Moments later, comments from her viewers came pouring in.

Switch to 1st person POV:
Most of them were sympathetic to my situation. However there were a few commenters lamenting about how they wished it had been them to become Poki's tinies. I wished I could convey to them how wrong they were about wanting this hell. But from my own experience, I knew they wouuld never believe me even if I could tell them. Her lips closed again and I endured what felt like hours more of sucking and tossing in her hot damp cavern. I was under her tongue a lot of the time, where she would let me rest while her tongue flapped about talking to her stream. I had to cover my ears from the loudness of her voice... I have no idea how much of her spit I had drunk. It tasted like energy drink.

An eternity later, her lips parted again, and i was deposited onto her soft palm. You looked around and noticed she had stopped streaming. She was in a light t shirt and short shorts, obviously ready for bed.

"Wow, you're delicious little guy!" Poki exclaimed, her voice still loud with her mouth so close. "TBH I'm a little sad I don't get to eat you yet... I'll bet you'll be delicious beyond belief sliding down my throat... and I'll bet it'll be fun feeling a tiny squirm around in my tummy!" While saying this, she teasingly pulls up her shirt and rubs your slick, tiny body down her exposed tummy.

"Oh well, I'm sure I'll enjoy having you as a pet until that day comes. Speaking of which, I'll tell you right now, you're gonna be spending a fair bit of time in my mouth. You're way too delicious, and plus my viewers seem to love it... but that's not where you'll spend most of your time. The majority of the time I'll be keeping you as..."
1211.title: Just a taste

choices: Still in her sock, and she's going on a morning jog!
On the floor in front of her bare feet. She's streaming all morning!
Being rented out to Lily for a day.
12111.content:
"You're lucky little guy," Poki stated matter-of-factly as she held me between her thumb and forefinger, sat on her bed, and crossed her right ankle over her left knee. "Cuz tbh, I've good good feet. I mean they don't smell or nothin', they're always washed, I get em' pedicured... I mean I'm honestly pretty proud of my feet. So lucky you to get to spend so much time with them!"

As she said this, she moved my small body toward her soft creamy sole. As I approached I could smell the soft scent of soap and lotion, mixed with a faint hint of sweat from the extended streaming session coming off her sole in waves of gentle heat. It was an incredible aroma that just excited me even more. This was it! I had finally made it to my greatest dream! I was going to be Poki's foot pet, played with between her soft but powerful toes until the day she got to eat me. I was convinced, this was going to be heaven!

"But also little guy," she said, breaking my train of thought, "this is actually gonna be the last time I ever talk to you like this. I mean who knows when I'm gonna need to eat you to make sure I don't ever shrink and have to become some other bitch's foot slave! ...Lily always gave me weird looks up until now... before I had a tiny to cure myself. So I can't just keep talking to you and making you think we're family or friends or anything weird like that when I'm literally gonna eat you. Plus, as much as I like my feet, I'm guessing your dick won't stay that hard for em' for long. Not once you've seen what a life of being literally trapped under another person's unrelenting, sweaty soles 24/7 is like. And I don't want you ever thinking you have any right to complain about any of that to me. Remember, you're the one who gave themselves to me. I'm your owner. So from now on, you're a foot toy, an occasional candy, and an eventual snack. Nothing more, nothing less. Good luck."

And before I had a chance to fully process what she had just said, Her hand, with me in it, swooped down to the floor. She had deftly used her thumb and finger to pull me into her palm. My stomach dropped as I lurched downward. Then with her other fingers now securing me to her palm, her titanic thumb and pointer finger extended out towards the floor, and clenched around a dark pink cloth, which I immediately recognized as an ankle sock. She lifted me and the sock up to her waist, and then positioned me over the opening, and released her fingers that were holding me to her palm. My stomach dropped again as I plummeted down the short tube of pink fabric, and landed softly in the toe. Surprisingly the toe section around you was very slightly damp, and just a bit musky. I realized she must have worn this today, before she opened the 'tiny delivery' package with me inside it. I guess she thinks this will be a good introduction to her feet? At least she's not immediately tossing me in her running shoe.... though I can't say I'd complain if she did. ..

Before I could get lost in thought, the light from Poki's room grew dim, and her massive creamy white, long toes covered the entrance to the sock which was now my prison. Her toad approached me at an astounding pace for their size. I cowered into a ball, and immediately felt her small vehicle sized toes wrap around me, pulling me into a tight toe hug. It was difficult to breath as my head was squeezed into her soft, damp flesh. The aroma with the lightly used sock and her bare foot were indescribable. It was hard to concentrate. Then the squeezing finally relented. I felt gravity shift and my stomach dropped again, until suddenly i pounded into the hard floor. There wasn't much pressure above me but it was still intense. She must be putting on her other sock! A few moments later the pressure released, I was again hoisted high into the air, securely placed between her second and third toes. Then the squeezing and scrunching cycle started again... It went on longer than I could consciously account for, until finally, all movement subsided, and I heard Poki lightly dozing in the relative distance. The sock was surprisingly tight, and there was no way I could escape the valley of her arched toes even if I wanted to. So I fell asleep, equally eager and horrified about the next day.

When I woke up the next day I found I was:
